summary: Changes all item weights to pounds (lbs) and adjusts to realistic levels.
descriptionHtml:
For those who like added realism, this mod is for you.

Key features;
*All item weights modified to pounds (lbs) and changed to realistic levels
*All race default carrying limits and starting stats modified to realistic levels
*Weapon offence recalculated using mass and swing speed
*Armour defence modified to reflect resilience of materials
*Armour classification (light/heavy) changed where necessary
*Weapon swing speeds modified to reflect new weights
*Gold coins now have weight
*Dawnguard weapons are now Silver
*Circlets are now wearable with hoods
*Cultist & Dunmer robes disenchanted
*Most legendary items can be disenchanted
*Pickaxes are now 2-handed
*Item recipes adjusted to fit new item weights, materials and appearance

Material conversions

Corundum = Chromium
Dwarven = Brass
Ebony = Obsidian
Moonstone = Aluminium
Orichalcum = Bronze
Quicksilver = Mercury
Daedric = High Carbon Steel
Dragonbone = Ivory
Stahlrim = Diamond

NB: You\'ll need to start a new game for the stat changes to take effect, or try using the console commands to change race and back.

This is a WIP and my first mod, so any constructive feedback would be appreciated.
I also have a Dragonborn mod to go with it contained within the same .rar file. I know it says Hearthfire but in fact that\'s the Dragonborn mod. I\'m still working on Hearthfire.
Both Mods are compatible with all official DLC. They will not, however, affect any items introduced using unofficial DLC. Please do not use this mod with others that affect item weights or it may crash the game.

Enjoy!
Regards, EOL.
